author: rcm
msg: reorder the creation of collection and object adapters so we attempt to create a collection adapter first, if this fails we then go on to try and create an object adapter.  This prevents collections being wrapped using an object adapter, as the latter are more genric.

author: rcm
msg: the key object used to map internal collection now ensures that the field name is normalized

author: rcm
msg: Added logging to show changes to the adapter hash
